name: stuffed beghrir
ingredients: Beghrir batter (extra fine semolina, lukewarm water, yeast, salt)
Savory filling (traditional): onion, peppers, olive oil, paprika, cumin, salt, pepper (or variations with ground meat, chicken, tuna)
steps: Prepare the beghrir batter: Blend the semolina, water, yeast, and salt until you get a smooth batter. Let it rest and rise.
Cook the beghrir pancakes on a hot pan (one side only) until the top is dry and full of holes. Set aside.

Prepare the filling: Finely chop the onion and pepper (or use the filling of your choice). Saut√© the onion, add the spices and pepper (or other filling ingredients). Let it simmer until the filling is cooked and dry.

Assembly: Place a beghrir pancake (holey side up). Spread the filling evenly. Cover with a second pancake (holey side down). Press the edges to seal them. Cover for a few seconds so the bottom of the pancake becomes golden.
Cut the stuffed pancake into quarters. Generously coat it with olive oil.
